basics.name: Truong Quang Vo
basics.summary: PhD student in Machine Learning at Northwestern University specializing in LLM evaluation, alignment, and efficient training. Passionate about developing trustworthy AI systems and advancing scalable machine learning algorithms.

work.name: Sabre Holdings
work.summary: Developed multi-agent AI systems and personalized travel recommendation engines
highlights: Developed multi-agent AI system with AutoGen for personalized air travel recommender
Integrated SendGrid API for automated communication and end-to-end recommendation pipeline

work.name: Mintel Group
work.summary: Developed AI workflows and agentic RAG systems for market analytics
highlights: Led development of AI workflow using LangGraph for deep analysis of global F&B market
Built agentic retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) system with Pinecone vector database
Developed analytic agent for SQL querying and trend detection across 20 GB of data
